titleStmt.title: Letters of Appeal - Bethel Baptist Church Rally
titleStmt.author: Author Unknown

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

objectDesc.p: Handwritten letter from an Unknown/Unclear Author to Eartha M. M. White on 4/13/1930 regarding a rally for the second Bethel Baptist Church.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

body.p:
Miss BirthEartha White i am askin
ya to please help me in my
Rally of seckansecond Bethel
Baptist L HhurchChurch. We are in
a $100.00 Dollar Rally. Each
District arare to Report $2.50
Dollars. we are a few in number
please vote for District no 2number two
i Know ya dont noknow me
By my name we arare all waring
For the Land i am sending
ya this card Decan W
James sister Gracie Armstrong
chearmanchairman R q O'Beacly pastor
1812 Prince stStreet please doe all
ya can miss White
District no 2number two W Jamesthis is written on the cardthat accompanies the letter.
